name: AP Music Theory
description: The AP Music Theory course will develop a student's ability to recognize, understand, and describe the basic materials and processes of music that are heard or presented in a score. There will be special emphasis on developing sight-singing and aural skills as well as score analysis and composition techniques. This course is suggested for highly motivated students who may be considering music as a college major, and it is designed to replicate the year-long college freshman course. Students must have performing skills in voice or an instrument as demonstrated by participation in a school performing ensemble or by audition with the instructor.
